sentences.en: a government official
sentences.cn: 政府官员

sentences.en: A ministry official described the report as groundless.
sentences.cn: 一位部级官员称这篇报道纯属子虚乌有。

sentences.en: A senior White House official said the agreement is close.
sentences.cn: 白宫的一位高级官员说即将达成协议。

sentences.en: According to one official more than a hundred people have been arrested.
sentences.cn: 一名官员称有一百多人被捕。

sentences.en: An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital.
sentences.cn: 一份官方法令宣布在首都举行的投票无效。

sentences.en: an official investigation into the causes of the explosion
sentences.cn: 对此次爆炸事件原因的官方调查

sentences.en: Don't make any policy decisions which clash with official company thinking.
sentences.cn: 所作的任何决策都不要和公司官方理念相冲突。

sentences.en: Finally the letter of appointment came, making it all official.
sentences.cn: 任命书终于来了，这样一切都名正言顺了。

sentences.en: He was eventually convicted for the misuse of official funds.
sentences.cn: 最终他因滥用公款被判有罪。

sentences.en: Her official number is carved on the port side of the forecabin.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的注册编号刻在前舱的左舷上。

sentences.en: In some ways, the official opening is a formality.
sentences.cn: 从某些方面来说，正式的开幕仪式只不过是走个形式。

sentences.en: Official handouts describe the Emperor as "particularly noted as a scholar".
sentences.cn: 官方印发的材料将皇帝描述为“尤以学识渊博而著称”。

sentences.en: official statistics about illegal drug use
sentences.cn: 非法使用毒品的官方统计数据

sentences.en: senior administration officials
sentences.cn: 高级行政人员

sentences.en: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

sentences.en: the official policy on education
sentences.cn: 官方的教育政策

sentences.en: The official report basically exonerated everyone.
sentences.cn: 官方报道基本上宣布所有人无罪。

sentences.en: The old official club website address has been taken over by cybersquatters.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部原来的官方网址已经被人抢注了。

sentences.en: The prose of his official communications was so laboured, pompous and verbose.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的公文矫揉浮华，长篇大论。

sentences.en: the Queen’s performance of official duties
sentences.cn: 女王对公职的履行

sentences.en: The reporter trapped the official into giving away a secret.
sentences.cn: 记者用计诱使那个官员泄露了一个秘密。

sentences.en: This passport has to be signed before the official can validate it.
sentences.cn: 这个护照必须先行签署，官方才能确认其有效。

sentences.en: Vietnam made an official request that the meeting be postponed.
sentences.cn: 越南已经正式请求将会议推迟。

sentences.en: You simply can't get a ticket through official channels.
sentences.cn: 通过官方渠道是压根儿搞不到票的.

sentences.en: You will have to get official permission first.
sentences.cn: 你必须先得到正式许可。

sentences.en: You'd better declare the camera to the official.
sentences.cn: 你最好把照相机向海关官员申报纳税。

words.tran_cn: 正式地；官方地；作为公务员
军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长
官场；官员（总称）；官僚作风
使官方化；使成为正式；置在政府机关管辖下
官方的,法定的,合法的,认可的
正式的,合适的,传统的,煞费苦心的,豪华的

phrases.tran_cn: 公务人员；政府工作人员

trans.tran_cn: 官方的，公务的，公开的，公务的，冠冕堂皇的
trans.tran_en: approved of or done by someone in authority, especially the government
someone who is in a position of authority in an organization
